scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run bootstrap
scripts.components:start: node .build/banner.js components:start && npm --prefix packages/components run start
scripts.components:serve: node .build/banner.js components:serve && npm --prefix packages/components run serve
scripts.testing:serve: node .build/banner.js testing:serve && npm --prefix packages/testing run serve
scripts.testing:server: node .build/banner.js testing:server && npm --prefix packages/testing run ci:server
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:main && npm run build:post
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:pre && npm run build:main && npm --prefix packages/components run build:docs
scripts.build:pre: npm run build:fonts && npm run build:icons
scripts.build:fonts: node .build/banner.js build:fonts && npm --prefix packages/fonts run build
scripts.build:icons: node .build/banner.js build:icons && npm --prefix packages/icons run build
scripts.build:main: npm run build:components && npm run build:table && npm run build:testing
scripts.build:components: node .build/banner.js build:components && STENCIL_MODE=prod npm --prefix packages/components run build
scripts.build:components:docs: node .build/banner.js build:components && STENCIL_MODE=docs npm --prefix packages/components run build
scripts.build:table: node .build/banner.js build:table && npm --prefix packages/components-table run build
scripts.build:testing: node .build/banner.js build:testing && npm --prefix packages/testing run build
scripts.build:post: npm run build:testing && npm run build:react && npm run build:angular && npm run build:vue
scripts.build:react: node .build/banner.js build:react && npm --prefix packages/components-react run build
scripts.build:angular: node .build/banner.js build:angular && npm --prefix packages/components-angular run build
scripts.build:vue: node .build/banner.js build:vue && npm --prefix packages/components-vue run build
scripts.test:components: node .build/banner.js test:components && cd packages/components && npm run test
scripts.test:cypress: node .build/banner.js test:cypress && npm --prefix packages/testing run test
scripts.test:serve: node .build/banner.js test:cypress && npm --prefix packages/testing run serve
scripts.test:server: node .build/banner.js test:server && npm run test:build-server && npm run test:start-server
